meanings.definition: One who legitimizes or makes legitimate.
meanings.sent1: The legitimizers helped make the decision official.
meanings.sent2: The government's approval was the ultimate legitimizers of the new law.
meanings.sent3: The legitimizers were like the stamp of approval on the document.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the king acted as the legitimizers of the prince's claim to the throne.
meanings.sent5: The legitimizers were the key to ensuring the contract was valid.
